text: The Porsche-Museum is an automotive museum in Stuttgart of the car maker Porsche. Porsche-Museum is located at the Porsche-Platz in the township Zuffenhausen. The museum was opened in 2009. == Gallery == Image:Porsche360.jpg|Four wheel drive Porsche 360 Cisitalia (1947) Image:PorscheNo1.jpg|Porsche 356 Nr. 1 Roadster (1948) Image:Porsche 718-2.jpg|Porsche Typ 804, Formula 1 racing car(1962) Image:Porsche 917C.jpg|Porsche 917 Short coupé (1970) Image:1971 Porsche 917-4.9 LH Coupé.jpg|Porsche 917 Long coupé (1971) Image:Porsche917-30.jpg|The 1100 hp Porsche 917/30 Spider (1973) Image:Rothmans_Porsche_962C_(17)_(Chassis_006)_1987_24_Hours_of_Le_Mans_winner.jpg|Porsche 956C coupé (1981 - 1985) Image:McLaren MP4 2C TAG Porsche F1.jpg|McLaren TAG Porsche F1 (1985) Image:Porsche 911 GT1 '98 -25.jpg|Porsche 911 GT1 '98, with Le Mans starting number 25 (1998) Image:2003 Porsche Carrera GT.jpg|The 612 hp Carrera GT (2003) File:Neues Porsche-Museum am Porscheplatz Stuttgart- Zuffenhausen 2007 Foto Wolfgang Pehlemann DSCN8511.jpg|New Porsche-Museum under construction, September 2007 Image:Porsche-Museum-Zuffenhausen.jpg|The new museum under construction, November 2008 File:Porsche-Museum from North.JPG|The finished Porsche-Museum, January 2009 File:Porsche-Museum from West.JPG|View from West == Other websites == * Website Porsche Museum Category:Automobiles Category:Buildings and structures in Baden-Württemberg Category:Museums in Germany Category:Stuttgart
title: Porsche-Museum
